verses.text: FOLOFOLA ‘a Sihova ki hoku ‘Eiki, “Nofo koe ‘i hoku to‘omata‘u ni, Kae‘oua ke u ‘ai ho fili fua pē Ke hoko ko ho tu‘ungava‘e.”
‘E mafao atu ‘e Sihova mei Saione ‘a e sēpita ‘o ho hau, he‘ene pehē, “‘I he lotolotonga ‘o ho ngaahi fili, pule pē koe.”
‘I he ‘aho ‘oku ke fakatē tau, ‘e tali ko au ‘e he kakai na; Te nau tu‘u mai ‘i he ngaahi teunga tāpuhā: Hangē ko e fanau‘i ‘e he pongipongi ‘a e hahau, ‘E pehē ‘a e ha‘u kiate koe ho‘o kau talavou.
Kuo fuakava ‘a Sihova, pea ‘e ‘ikai te ne fakatomala, Ko e taula‘eiki koe ‘o ta‘engata pē, ‘I he ‘alunga ‘o Melikiseteki
Ko ‘Ātonai mei ho to‘omata‘u Te ne laiki tu‘i ‘i he ‘aho ‘o hono houhau:
Te ne fakamaau ‘i he ngaahi pule‘anga, Kuo ne fakafonu ‘anga‘anga; Ko ne laiki ‘a e ‘ulu ‘o e fu‘ufu‘unga fonua.
Mei he vaitafe ‘i he hala te ne inu; Ko ia ai, te ne mahiki hono ‘ulu.
